Welcome to fair-sciml Documentation!
====================================

   source/simulators  
   deeponet    
   source/ml         
   source/utils    

Project Overview
----------------

This project includes PDE simulators and a DeepONet model for machine learning applications. It also provides various utilities and machine learning tools for scientific computing.
